definitions.title: 1. adj. gent.
definitions.body: ´[[שֵׂעִיר הַח]] Ge 36:20 Seir the Horite (P); rd. ´[[הַחִ]] also v:Ge 36:2 for MT [[הַחִוִּי]]

definitions.title: 2. n.pr.gent.
definitions.body: alw. c. art.; usu. sg. coll. [[הַחׂרִיִ]], ancient inhabitants of land of Edom Ge 14:6 ([[בְּהַרֲרָם שֵׂעִיר]]); in P called [[בְּנֵי שֵׂעִיר בְּאֶרֶץ אֱדוֹם]] Ge 36:21 (vid. v:Ge 36:20); cf. v:Ge 36:29, v:Ge 36:30; acc. to De 2:12 (where alone [[הַחׂרִים]]), v:De 2:22 they were driven out by sons of Esau (yet v. Ge 36:1 c. and Di); LXX o( Xorraiov, oi( Xorraioi, (Ge 36:29, Ge 36:30 Xorr(e)i).

definitions.title: 3. n. pr. pers. m. a.
definitions.body: [[חׂרִי]] an Edomite Ge 36:22 = 1Ch 1:39; LXX Xorr(e)i.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[חִוֹרי]] a Simeonite Nu 13:5, but LXX Sour(e)i, LXXL Soudri.—I. [[חׂרִי]] v. sub I. [[חור]].
